oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Brenda Lee interview - Ralph Emery
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First part of recording is an interview with Brenda Lee (performer), conducted by Ralph Emery. Second part of recording is a performance of It's A Helluva Time To Be Thinking About Heaven, as performed by an unidentified male duo.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ralph Emery introduces Brenda Lee and asks her about her gardening -- (00:03) Brenda Lee talks about her garden, and how she does not like to plant or maintain the garden, but she loves to pick -- (00:30) Brenda Lee tells a story about her collard greens -- (02:30) It's A Helluva Time To Be Thinking About Heaven ([Unidentified]) [unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:format: 1/4 inch -- 2 quarter tracks ; 1/4 inch -- full track
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emery, Ralph; Lee, Brenda, 1944-;
